ARABIC: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا لَٰعِبِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We did not create the heavens and the earth and everything between them as a game.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We have not created the heavens and the earth and all that lies between them, out of play.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: It was not in idle sport that We created the heavens and the earth and all that is between them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We have not created the heavens and the earth and all that is between them for Our own amusement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We did not create the heavens and the earth, and all that is between them, just for play.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And We created not the heavens and the earth, and all that is between them, for mere play.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We did not create the heavens and the earth and what is between them in sport.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: We created not the heavens and earth, and all that between them is, in play;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And We created not the heavens and the earth, and all that is between them, in play.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We did not idly create the heavens and the earth and all that lies between them;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We created not the heavens and the earth and all that is in-between the twain sporting.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We did not create the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them for play.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We created not the heavens, the earth, and all between them, merely in (idle) sport:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And We created not the heavens and the earth, and all that is between them, for mere play,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: It was not in play that We created the heavens and the earth and all that is between them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We did not create the heavens and the earth and what is between them to play.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We did not create the heavens and earth and that between them in play.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [44:38] And We did not create the heavens and the earth and all that is between them, [intending] to play, by creating all that (lā‘ibīna, ‘to play’, is a circumstantial qualifier).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And We created not the heavens and the earth, and all that is between them) of creation, (in play) in amusement.
